thread.title: Elon Musk's 'Boring' plans for L.A. transport

title: Elon Musk's 'Boring' plans for L.A. transport
text:
Elon Musk's 'Boring' plans for L.A. transport 11:53am BST - 01:57
Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk promised a cheering crowd on Thursday that his controversial dream of burrowing a high-speed network of ''personalized mass transit'' tunnels under Los Angeles could be achieved without disturbance or noise at the surface. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk promised a cheering crowd on Thursday that his controversial dream of burrowing a high-speed network of "personalized mass transit" tunnels under Los Angeles could be achieved without disturbance or noise at the surface.
